languages.text: "Потому что мое сердце пылает верой и жаждой подвига во имя Его. Твое же лишь полнится перечнем законов".
"Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."
languages.original_text: "Потому что мое сердце пылает верой и жаждой подвига во имя Его. Твое же лишь полнится перечнем законов".

traits.locale_text: "Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great exploits. Yours is but a list of laws."
"Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great exploits. Yours is but a list of laws."
"Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great exploits. Yours is but a list of laws."
"Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."
"Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."

languages.text: 「私の心は信仰に燃え、偉業を渇望している。あなたのそれは、ただの法の羅列にすぎない」
languages.original_text: "Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."

traits.locale_text: 「私の心は信仰に燃え、偉業を渇望している。あなたのそれは、ただの法の羅列にすぎない」

languages.text: "Weil der Glaube in meinem Herzen brennt und es nach großen Taten in Seinem Namen giert. Das Eure ist nur eine Liste von Gesetzen."
languages.original_text: "Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."

traits.locale_text: "Weil der Glaube in meinem Herzen brennt und es nach großen Taten in Seinem Namen giert. Das Eure ist nur eine Liste von Gesetzen."

languages.text: « Parce que la flamme de la foi brûle dans mon cœur et qu'il a soif de grands exploits en Son nom. Le vôtre n'est qu'une liste de lois. »
languages.original_text: "Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que la flamme de la foi brûle dans mon cœur et qu'il a soif de grands exploits en Son nom. Le vôtre n'est qu'une liste de lois. »

languages.text: «Porque mi corazón arde henchido de fe y aspira a grandes hazañas en nombre del Emperador. En el suyo no hay cabida más que para una lista de leyes».
languages.original_text: "Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."

traits.locale_text: «Porque mi corazón arde henchido de fe y aspira a grandes hazañas en nombre del Emperador. En el suyo no hay cabida más que para una lista de leyes».

languages.text: “因为我心中燃烧着不灭的信念，渴望以帝皇之名实现伟大成就，而你脑子里只装着法律条款。”
languages.original_text: "Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."

traits.locale_text: “因为我心中燃烧着不灭的信念，渴望以帝皇之名实现伟大成就，而你脑子里只装着法律条款。”

languages.text: "Çünkü yüreğim, inanç ve O'nun adına başarı elde etme aşkıyla yanıyor. Seninse yalnız kanunların var."
languages.original_text: "Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü yüreğim, inanç ve O'nun adına başarı elde etme aşkıyla yanıyor. Seninse yalnız kanunların var."

languages.original_text: "Because my heart burns with faith and hungers for great deeds in His name. Yours is but a list of laws."
